definition: abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia
to toil/labor/laborer/to put sb to trouble (of doing sth)/meritorious deed/to console (Taiwan pr. [lao4] for this sense)
Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]

sentences.english: Marie-Thérèse was also the mother of his son Claude, and his daughter Paloma.
sentences.chinese: 瑪麗後來又生了兒子克勞德和女兒帕露瑪。

sentences.english: Claude is the studio's head honcho.
sentences.chinese: 克勞德是電影公司的老闆。

sentences.english: That year, he married his first wife, Mary Paul MacLeod.
sentences.chinese: 這一年，他娶了他的第一任妻子瑪麗保羅麥克勞德。

sentences.english: Shaking his mate's body hard, Claud wanted to wake him.
sentences.chinese: 克勞德用力搖着同伴的身體，想要喚醒他。

sentences.english: Claud quickened up, a man wouldn't give the battle.
sentences.chinese: 克勞德加快了速度，男子漢是不會認輸的。

sentences.english: She is playing Mary McLeod Bethune.
sentences.chinese: 她扮演瑪麗麥克勞德白求恩。

sentences.english: Claud is very good at chatting up strange girls and getting then to go out with him.
sentences.chinese: 克勞德很會與陌生姑娘閒聊親近，並邀他們一起外出。

sentences.english: When the argument got hot, Claud chimed in .
sentences.chinese: 當爭論激烈時，克勞德也參加進來了。

sentences.english: Marie was also the mother of his son Claude, and his daughter Paloma.
sentences.chinese: 瑪麗後來又生了兒子克勞德和女兒帕露瑪。

definition: Taiwan equivalent of 莫奈[Mo4 nai4]
the Franks (Germanic people who arrived in Europe from 600 AD and took over France)
